= java =

== memory ==
NOTICE: 64bit-model

| type     | bytes   |
| boolean  | 1       |
| char     | 2       |
| int      | 4       |
| float    | 4       |
| long     | 8       |
| double   | 8       |
| char[]   | 2N + 24 |
| int[]    | 4N + 24 |
| double[] | 8N + 24 |
| char[][] | ~2MN    |

== class ==
=== memory ===
64bit machine

- object overhead 16 bytes
- reference 8 bytes
- one dim array
    sizeof(elem) * N + 24
- 8 bytes alignment or padding
- inner class + EXTRA 8 bytes
